title: The real reason behind scarcity
text:
After the anouncment of scarcity our investigators at on tether dug into the real truth behind scarcity and what we found was very frightning.
The deep truth comes from an anonymous source that explains a relationship of one of the devs and the harsh break up he went through. As it turns out the main deciding factor comes to revenge. Our CCP member
